title: Iron Solari Leona shop bug.

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
In the champ select leona's Iron Solari  skin does not appear but when you go to the shop it is there.
http://gyazo.com/402b947dabb7945867f7bde3aeb67096

replies.body: From asking people noone that doesnt have it can view it, is that on purpose or a bug?

There's a lot of skins that don't show up in the list if you don't own them... take a look at teemo, 2 skins will not show up in the skin select screen if you don't own them. Same with Nosferatu Vlad. I don't know if it's intentional, but a lot of skins don't show up on many champs if you do not own them. :|

Hey HellHoundMMXIV! 

I just loaded up in champ select, and I was able to view the Iron Solari skin. Does this happen every time, or was this a one time thing?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A76hUteQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-21T17:37:19.336+0000)
>
> Hey HellHoundMMXIV! 
> 
> I just loaded up in champ select, and I was able to view the Iron Solari skin. Does this happen every time, or was this a one time thing?

It appears its still happening to me, could it be a team builder bug?
It doesn't appear to be so. I'm still seeing the skin. Do you own Iron Solari Leona?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A76hUteQ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-21T17:48:36.647+0000)
>
> It doesn't appear to be so. I'm still seeing the skin. Do you own Iron Solari Leona?

No, Ill ask one of my friends who does if he can view it
Hmm, that could be why. I own the skin, so it would make sense that it's showing up.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A76hUteQ,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-21T17:51:11.057+0000)
>
> Hmm, that could be why. I own the skin, so it would make sense that it's showing up.

Seems how that was how i found this bug, i just bought the skin and it is showing up for me now.
Same with me. I don't own the skin.
Yep, my friend isnt having her appear for him either
Yeah, just retested it Its happening on all game modes for me
